body.bibl: Keulen, Percy S. F. van. “A Case of Ancient Exegesis: The Story of Solomon’s Adversaries (1 Kgs. 11:14-25) in Septuaginta, Peshitta, and Josephus.” In Bible and Computer: The Stellenbosch AIBI-6 Conference.
